attributes.action: limit house and car ownership to one per family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: House prices are one of the biggest menaces in society. Decent normal people cannot afford them now. I would like to see and end to houses used as a way to make money, by limiting ownership to one per person. This in one fell swoop would cease greedy people trying to cash in and pricing others out of the market. And to control traffic numbers, also limit the number of cars to one per household.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
